TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit NameObjectCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class NameObjectCollectionBase Implements ICollection, IDeserializationCallback, ISerializable
public ref class NameObjectCollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 为关联的 键和 值的集合（可通过键或索引来访问它）提供 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的基础结构是一个哈希表。The underlying structure for this class is a hash table. 每个元素是一个键/值对。Each element is a key/value pair. 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码实例。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，此类使用区分区域性的字符串比较。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 但是，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更高版本中，此类使用比较字符串时。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 有关如何区域性影响比较和排序的详细信息，请参阅[执行不区分区域性的字符串操作](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). `null` 允许作为键或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > 方法之间没有区别`null`返回这是因为找不到指定的键和`null`因为与键关联的值返回这`null`。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现和使用类。The following code example shows how to implement and use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/nameobjectcollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/nameobjectcollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/nameobjectcollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码实例。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 默认哈希代码提供程序是。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器是。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

param.span: 对象，用于确定两个键是否相等，并为集合中的键生成哈希代码。

span.span: The object to use to determine whether two keys are equal and to generate hash codes for the keys in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量对象是元素的数目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 对象组合比较器和哈希代码提供程序。The object combines the comparer and the hash code provider. 哈希代码提供程序分配中的键的哈希代码。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量的容量增加通过自动重新分配在内部数组和现有元素被复制到新数组中，在添加新的元素之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用创建新中元素。The following code example uses to create a new with elements from an . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd/CPP/nocb_baseadd.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd/CS/nocb_baseadd.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseAdd/VB/nocb_baseadd.vb#1)]

span.span: An that represents the value of the first entry with the specified key, if found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含具有指定键的多个条目，此方法将返回仅的第一个条目。If the collection contains multiple entries with the specified key, this method returns only the first entry. 若要使用相同的键获取后续项的值，请使用枚举器循环访问集合并对键进行比较。To get the values of subsequent entries with the same key, use the enumerator to iterate through the collection and compare the keys. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法返回`null`在以下情况： 1) 如果找不到指定的键;和 2） 如果找到指定的键，其关联的值为`null`。This method returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 此方法不区分两种情况。This method does not distinguish between the two cases. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和若要获取特定的键和值。The following code example uses and to get specific keys and values. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/CPP/nocb_baseget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/CS/nocb_baseget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/VB/nocb_baseget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不具有指定键，包含的元素保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和要从中移除元素。The following code example uses and to remove elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CPP/nocb_baseremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CS/nocb_baseremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/VB/nocb_baseremove.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含在 实例中的键/值对的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of key/value pairs contained in the instance.

value.span: 包含在 实例中的键/值对的数目。

span.span: The number of key/value pairs contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以存储。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终是大于或等于。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果添加元素时超过容量，通过在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举器返回的字符串形式的集合的键。This enumerator returns the keys of the collection as strings. C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示 实例是否为只读的。

span.span: if the instance is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建只读集合。The following code example creates a read-only collection. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CPP/nocb_isreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CS/nocb_isreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/VB/nocb_isreadonly.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 对象的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不同步对象。A object is not synchronized. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用属性在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本类使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作属性对象，不是直接对对象。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
